snippet.title: A day in the life of billionaire Richard Branson, who drinks up to 20 cups of tea a day
snippet.content:
Sir Richard Branson .
After founding Virgin Records in 1972, the mogul went on to establish the Virgin Group conglomerate, get knighted by the Queen of England, and accrue a personal fortune of about $US5 billion, .
The business magnate is now famous for his and his casual, mischievous attitude. This is the man who with a Virgin employee he caught napping on the job, after all.
, Branson doesn't intend to retire and "spends most of his time working on not-for-profit initiatives."
